outline:
1. to be long, prolong
    1. (Qal) to be long
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to prolong (days)
      2. to make long (tent cords)
      3. to grow long, continue long
kjv_def: defer, draw out, lengthen, (be, become, make, pro-) long, [phrase] (out-, over-) live, tarry (long).
strongs_def: to be (causative, make) long (literally or figuratively)
